value:
$WmMPID_水着ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Swim18,Face|To win this battle, you need a master
strategist. We must combine our
forces!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Swim18,Face|Clearly defined leadership is essential
to victory. We're in.$k$pWait, Noire...are you OK?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ノワール,ch04_26_Noir_F_Swim18,Face|We've been standing in the sun for
hours... I'm not feeling so great...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|If we work together, I'm sure that we
can make it through this! Let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Swim18,Face|That was a true demonstration of
strength... I hope we can meet again
one day.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That's the end of it...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I was able to capture all SORTS of
voices from all the Heroes. I can't
wait to listen!$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Commander Anna?
Did your recording turn out?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No. It didn't. The ocean is so loud...
All you can hear is crashing waves.$k$pThis...is bad. Really bad. What are we
going to do?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Let me listen...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You're right. All I hear is the roaring
of the surf and waves crashing.$k$pThis takes me right back to the
beach...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|That's it! That...just might work! The
sound of the ocean is really relaxing,
isn't it?$k$pThat's how we'll sell it! Pop open the
tome, sit back, and relax...to the
sounds of the ocean.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Really?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Don't you get in my way, Alfonse!
We're so far in the hole, we'll never
get out of it if this thing doesn't sell.$k$pI have no choice—I'm staking
everything on relaxation!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Spoken like a gambler who's hit
rock bottom.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Spoken like a master merchant! Who
doesn't want to be lulled to sleep by
ocean sounds? This will be big!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Of all the...
Hey, $Nu?$k$pI hate to ask, but... Let's find a quiet
spot and come up with ways to keep
the Order afloat. It's up to us, now.$k$p$Sbs150|
